name: Temple of Misfortune
description:
Temple of Misfortune is a tile-based puzzle game with an intuitive click-to-move mechanic made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 (Roll of the Dice). Delve into the mysterious temple, read clues, use the dice to solve challenges, and progress through the dark temple! 

Controls
  • Left click on a tile to move to it
  • Click and hold down the right-click button to orbit your view 
Credits

Programming and 3D modeling were done by me (Rony Hanna). Few textures were obtained from external websites (non-copyrighted and free to use).  

Thanks for trying out the game!
